info.title: Update Management API
info.description: APIs for managing software update configurations.

name.description: Name of the software update configuration run.

id.description: Resource Id of the software update configuration run

softwareUpdateConfiguration.description: software update configuration triggered this run

status.description: Status of the software update configuration run.

configuredDuration.description: Configured duration for the software update configuration run.

osType.description: Operating system target of the software update configuration triggered this run

startTime.description: Start time of the software update configuration run.

endTime.description: End time of the software update configuration run.

computerCount.description: Number of computers in the software update configuration run.

failedCount.description: Number of computers with failed status.

creationTime.description: Creation time of the resource, which only appears in the response.

createdBy.description: CreatedBy property, which only appears in the response.

lastModifiedTime.description: Last time resource was modified, which only appears in the response.

lastModifiedBy.description: LastModifiedBy property, which only appears in the response.

tasks.description: Software update configuration tasks triggered in this run

softareUpdateConfigurationRunTasks.description: Software update configuration run tasks model.

softareUpdateConfigurationRunTaskPropert.description: Task properties of the software update configuration.

source.description: The name of the source of the task.

jobId.description: The job id of the task.

updateConfigurationNavigation.description: Software update configuration Run Navigation model.

name.description: Name of the software update configuration triggered the software update configuration run

softwareUpdateConfigurationRunListResult.description: result of listing all software update configuration runs

value.description: outer object returned when listing all software update configuration runs

nextLink.description: link to next page of results.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response of an operation failure

AutomationAccountNameParameter.name: automationAccountName
AutomationAccountNameParameter.description: The name of the automation account.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
